reviewText: I have watched all of these episodes. They are really well done. I wish there were more episodes. As soon as I saw these were on dvd I placed my order.

The History Channel Conspiracy Theory 12 Episode Collection : TWA Flight 800 , Majestic Twelve UFO Cover-up , FDR and Pearl Harbor , Area 51 , Who Killed Martin Luther King Jr. , Princess Diana , Lincoln Assassination , Oklahoma City Bombing, CIA and the Nazis , Jack Ruby , RFK Assassination , Kecksburg UFO ,Best Evidence : Discovery Channel 6 Episode Conspiracy and Controversy Collection : TWA Flight 800 , Bigfoot , Chemical Contrails , John Wayne's Death , the Roswell Incident , Cattle Mutilations : Total 18 Episodes : 4 Disc Box Set : Over 13 Hours why is this not available. I and my friends find this stuff good for the mind. please make it  avail again!!!!

This video collection was a birthday gift to another.  The video tapes are of excellent quality and the viewer was not disappointed.  I received nothing but raving reviews about the video collection.  I have given other History Channel DVD collections as presents and my family loves them.  They are very interesting and of the highest quality.

I wanted to buy this set but found many of the TV programs I'd watched on TRU TV were not included here.  EX.  The Pentagon Missle conspiracy, The Louisiana con. about the BP oil disaster, The Great Lakes con. about water being the new oil, The Police State con. about the govt. declaring martial law & encampments in the US, The Wall Street con., Plum Island & Bioterrorism about gov't experimentation, Apocalypse 2012 con., HAARP education, 9/11 ed., Manchurian Candidate ed. about gov't mind control programs, Secret Societies ed. infiltrating the Bilderberg Group, Big Brother ed. on surveillance, etc.  These are some I have on my DVR & want to erase but can't find where to buy these eye-opening episodes that will make you think big time. John Wayne's Death??? Really? Where are the chilling episodes I've watched (& erased not knowing they weren't going to be available) & know were made but aren't in this lineup?

Pretty much all of the mainstream media is controlled already.  Certainly the history Channel has got its agenda, and this supposedly DVD series on famous conspiracies, is a whitewash job and not worth the time.

They throw in a lot of UFO crap, as additional brainwashing for the mass public.
my husband and i found this not only interesting but very enlightening. We both loved the way it was put together and found it o be full of evidence that could not be ignored.
